data.eml:eml: Redescription of Mastigias papua (Scyphozoa, Rhizostomeae) with designation of a neotype and recognition of two additional species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Souza, Mariana Rocha De (2018): Redescription of Mastigias papua (Scyphozoa, Rhizostomeae) with designation of a neotype and recognition of two additional species. Zootaxa 4457 (4): 520-536, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4457.4.2
